p: The roots of E. kebericho were collected from around Debre tabor town South Gondar Zone of the Amhara regional state which is located in North West direction and 667km far from the capital city Addis Ababa. The plant was then authenticated by Botanists in the Department of Biology, College of Natural and Computational Sciences, University of Gondar where a specimen with voucher number 002TYT/2019 was deposited for further reference.
